You may also be looking for Third Age 1999.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1999.

content.title: January
content.content:
11 - Novelist and poet Naomi Mitchison dies.
? - CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter issue 4 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
20 - Actor Elan Garfias is born.
26 - Fansite TheOneRing.net goes online.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 40 is published.

content.title: June
content.content: 7 - Tolkien: A Celebration: Collected Writings on a Literary Legacy is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
8 - The first Tolkien Thing is held.
30 - Mythcon 30 begins.
? - Other Hands 26 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
2 Mythcon 30 ends.
? - CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter issue 5 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
24-26 - Oxonmoot 1999.
25 - Author Marion Zimmer Bradley dies.

content.title: October
content.content:
1 - Noel Johnson, who played Ã‰omer in The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series), dies.
4 - Poems from The Hobbit is published.
11 - Principal photography for The Lord of the Rings (film series) starts.
15 - Author Barbara Strachey dies in Oxford.
? - CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter issue 6 is published.
? - Other Hands 27 is published.

content.title: November
content.content: 1 - George Allen and Unwin: A Remembrancer is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
4 - Voice actress Gaia Wise is born.
? - Mallorn 37 is published.

? - Root and Branch - Approaches towards Understanding Tolkien is published.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien's The Silmarillion is published.
? - Actress Megan Richards is born.
